title: ISic000187. Funerary epitaph of Lucius Iulius Attilianus
body:
1L(ucius) · Iulius · L(uci) · f(ilius) · Quir(ina) (scil. tribu)
2Attilianus
3vix(it) · an(nis) · XIX
4mens(ibus) · VII · d(iebus) · XIIII

1L·IULIUS·L·F·QUIR(scil. TRIBU)
2ATTILIANUS
3VIX·AN·XIX
4MENS·VII·D·XIIII

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Gualtherus

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Lucius Iulius Attilianus, son of Lucius, of the Quirina tribe, lived for 19 years, 7 months, 14 days.

commentary
